title: FIFA Cup May be Biggest-Ever Sporting Event: Alex Lasry
description: Alex Lasry, CEO of FIFA World Cup 26 NYNJ, says the World Cup final could be the biggest event in human history, telling Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” it will surpass even a Super Bowl or a Taylor Swift concert. (Source: Bloomberg)
